attributes.additional_details: The FA has been making more and more crass decisions sith everything. The FA is supposed to be a neutral bastion of the game but there is now no respect for them. This has been getting steadily worse and nothi is ever done. Suarez gets an 8 match ban and yet Terry has no FA charge despite being reported to the CPS. Harry Redknapp has a go at a ref and gets fined/warned. Ferguson slags off who he wants and nothing happens.
